_header: Almighty God that man gan make
_description: The Hermit and the Outlaw — 363 lines in 6-line stanzas

BLAdd37492.First Lines:
Almyghty god that man gan makeAnd suffred ded for oure
                    sake…
BLAdd37492.Last Lines:
…In heuene blysse that we may comeAnd make vs alle blythe
                    & glad
